Setup and configure a server

1. Set server properties 
$> genserve set rserver --port 8080 --dir ./public
In this example, "rserver" is the server name

2. Edit server file properties 
$> genserve edit rserver
Update the file 

{
  "rserver": {
    "serverName": "rserver",
    "defaultPage": "index.html",
    "protocol": "http://",
    "host": "localhost",
    "port": 8080,
    "staticDirs": [
      "C:/projects/genserve/public"
    ],
    "serverUrl": "http://localhost:5050/",
    "active": false,
    "timeout": 5000,
    "perMessageDeflate": false,
    "strictServerPort": "yes",
    "dynamicDirs": [],
    "dynamicExts": ".server.[cm]?js"
  }
}
Save and close the file

3. Start the server
$> genserve start rserver
4. Check that the server is up and running
$> genserve scan
